QueryResult.text: SELECT plc.object_code || pld.id || l.lookup_code AS picklist_key, plc.id AS picklist_context_key, plc.object_code AS object_code_key, (SELECT nls.name FROM cmn_captions_nls nls WHERE nls.table_name = 'ODF_OBJECTS' AND nls.pk_id = o.id AND nls.language_code = lang.language_code) AS object_code, plc.is_active, pld.id AS picklist_def_key, pld.name AS picklist, lt.id AS lookup_type_key, (SELECT cmn_captions_nls.name FROM cmn_captions_nls WHERE cmn_captions_nls.table_name = 'CMN_LOOKUP_TYPES' AND cmn_captions_nls.language_code = lang.language_code AND cmn_captions_nls.pk_id = lt.id) AS lookup_type, l.lookup_code AS lookup_code_key, (SELECT cmn_captions_nls.name FROM cmn_captions_nls WHERE cmn_captions_nls.table_name = 'CMN_LOOKUPS' AND cmn_captions_nls.language_code = lang.language_code AND cmn_captions_nls.pk_id = l.id) AS lookup_code, lang.language_code_key, lang.language_code, GREATEST(plc.last_updated_date, pld.last_updated_date, l.last_updated_date) AS clarity_updated_date, GREATEST(plc.created_date, pld.created_date, l.created_date) AS clarity_created_date FROM odf_picklist_contexts plc INNER JOIN (SELECT l_1.id AS language_code_key, l_1.language_code FROM cmn_languages l_1 WHERE l_1.is_dw_enabled = 1) lang ON 1 = 1 INNER JOIN odf_objects o ON plc.object_code = o.code INNER JOIN odf_picklist_defs pld ON plc.id = pld.context_id INNER JOIN cmn_lookup_types lt ON pld.lookup_type = lt.lookup_type INNER JOIN cmn_lookups l ON lt.lookup_type = l.lookup_type WHERE plc.object_code IN ('rdm_roadmap_item','rdm_roadmap')
